name: v1.6.3
body:
## What's Changed
* Update Aztec version in README by @fluiddot in https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/AztecEditor-Android/pull/1009
* Improve behaviour of pasting of other types of objects by @planarvoid in https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/AztecEditor-Android/pull/1013
* Update Kotlin to 1.6.10 by @ParaskP7 in https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/AztecEditor-Android/pull/1015
* [Compile Warnings As Errors] Resolve Warnings & Enable All Warnings as Errors by @ParaskP7 in https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/AztecEditor-Android/pull/1016
* Simplify containsPreformat method by @planarvoid in https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/AztecEditor-Android/pull/994
* Update `minSdkVersion` (from `21` to `24`) by @ParaskP7 in https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/AztecEditor-Android/pull/1017


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/AztecEditor-Android/compare/v1.6.2...v1.6.3

name: v1.6.2
body:
## What's Changed
* Move CI to Buildkite by @jkmassel in https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/AztecEditor-Android/pull/996
* Clear references in `AztecExceptionHandler.kt` by @planarvoid in https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/AztecEditor-Android/pull/995
* Fix issues with placeholders by @planarvoid in https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/AztecEditor-Android/pull/997
* Use adapter height when drawing a placeholder by @planarvoid in https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/AztecEditor-Android/pull/998
* Added task list as a potential button that you can add to toolbar by @khaykov in https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/AztecEditor-Android/pull/999
* Add `UrlPastePlugin.kt` to handle pasted links by @planarvoid https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/AztecEditor-Android/pull/1001
* Updated span removal logic when using exclusiveBlocks by @khaykov in https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/AztecEditor-Android/pull/1002
* Expand quote and preformat styling options by @khaykov in https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/AztecEditor-Android/pull/1004
* Add onDraw plugin and header leading margin option by @khaykov in https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/AztecEditor-Android/pull/1005
* Add styling options to task list by @khaykov in https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/AztecEditor-Android/pull/1007
* Update `targetSDKversion` to 31 for the Android 12 migration by @AjeshRPai in https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/AztecEditor-Android/pull/1006


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/AztecEditor-Android/compare/v1.6.1...v1.6.2

name: v1.6.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Advanced styling of headings by @planarvoid in https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/AztecEditor-Android/pull/992


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/AztecEditor-Android/compare/v1.6.0...v1.6.1

name: v1.6.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Update Gradle to 7.4.2 & AGP to 7.2.1 by @oguzkocer in https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/AztecEditor-Android/pull/991


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/AztecEditor-Android/compare/v1.5.9...v1.6.0

name: v1.5.9
body:
### New in release
- Placeholder API to draw Android views over the editor

name: v1.5.8
body:
### New in this release:

* Added two new actions for increasing and decraesing the indentation of list items (https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/AztecEditor-Android/pull/966)
* Improved performance by reducing memory usage when there are no image or videos in the content (https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/AztecEditor-Android/pull/983)

name: v1.5.7
body:
This release contains several new features and improvements
- There is a new type of a list - a task list - which is an unordered list with checkbox items at the beginning
- You can not modify the actions visible in the Aztec toolbar
- There is an option to disable nesting of blocks. For example disabling images inside of a list or horizontal rule inside of a quote
- You can now use `code` and `pre`

name: v1.5.4
body: - Heading Span - Reset previous font metrics if the font spacing changes [#952](https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/AztecEditor-Android/pull/952)

name: v1.5.3
body: - Prevent update selected styles when text changes on Gutenberg mode

name: v1.5.2
body: - Add Mark inline formatting

name: v1.5.1
body: - Preserve link, code span instances when styling

name: v1.5.0
body:
* Updates publish-to-s3 plugin to 0.7.0
* Adds support for publishing `-sources.jar` files along with the library artifacts

name: v1.4.0
body:
* Upgrades Gradle to 7.1.1
* Upgrades Android Gradle Plugin to 4.2.2
* Updates targetSdkVersion to 30
* Adds support for publishing library artifacts to s3 maven repo
* Feature: Add support for the mark HTML tag

name: v1.3.45
body:
- Change the license from GPL v2 to MPL v2: https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/AztecEditor-Android/pull/922
- Fix `parentStyle must not be null`: https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/AztecEditor-Android/pull/923
- Fix drag shadow dimensions crash: https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/AztecEditor-Android/pull/924
- Account for the end of buffer marker: https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/AztecEditor-Android/pull/928
- Accessibility Improvement: Remove focusing of AztecText control as it's unneeded in TalkBack mode: https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/AztecEditor-Android/pull/927

name: v1.3.41
body: Add option to disable collapsing of whitespaces

name: v1.3.40
body: Adds support to to customise styles for the Aztec Toolbar

name: v1.3.39
body:
### Fixed
- Move media button initialization to avoid crash when advanced toolbar is enabled and media button is disabled

name: v1.3.38
body:
### Fixed
- When text changes, only disable selection listener if text is empty

name: v1.3.37
body: Adds a working content watcher for all the changes of the AztecText (including changes of spannables)

name: v1.3.36
body:
- Implement start and reversed in lists
- Allow preformatted background alpha and tidying to be set from child classes
Updates the Glide version to 4.10.0

name: v1.3.34
body:
Add the ability to report to the host app the IndexOutOfBounds exception
 in android.text.DynamicLayout.getBlockIndex(DynamicLayout.java:646) on Android 8.X (#861)

name: v1.3.33
body: Fix an IndexOutOfBounds case in DynamicLayout.reflow() under Android 8.0.0 (#834)

name: v1.3.32
body: - Allow paragraph spans that do not extend AlignmentSpan (https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/AztecEditor-Android/pull/851)

name: v1.3.31
body: Fix lag deleting and inserting text

name: v1.3.30
body: Added the ability to signal undo/redo events to host app

name: v1.3.29
body:
Chromebook fixes:
  * Fix span overlapping on window resizing
  * Fix cursor size on new paragraph line
  * Fix breaking layout on slow window resizing

name: v1.3.28
body:
### Added
- AndroidX support  #825

name: v1.3.27
body:
Gutenberg fixes:
  * Suppress multiple onSelectionChanged events when listener is disabled #817
  * Avoid trimming spaces around html block elemts

name: v1.3.26
body:
### Fixed
- DynamicLayout Crash #813
- List handling in Gutenberg #812

name: v1.3.25
body:
### Changed
- Remove some unneeded logging #806
### Fixed
- Don't bail when ZWJ cleanup found end-of-text marker #807
- Prevent execution of InputFilter for new lines #809

name: v1.3.24
body: - Improvement to how clickable URL spans are handled #793

name: v1.3.23
body: - Fix for crash when inserting characters right before an image #801

name: v1.3.22
body: - Fix for crash on Samsung Clipboard ListView on Android 8.X #795

name: v1.3.21
body: Some performance improvements, mostly visible via the WPAndroid app https://github.com/wordpress-mobile/gutenberg-mobile/issues/672

name: v1.3.20
body: Support for <em> for italic and using it as default via the formatting toolbar.

name: v1.3.19
body: Fix to avoid autofocusing the editing component when it gets visible. Needed in Gutenberg where many Aztec instances are on screen at the same time.

name: v1.3.18
body: Revert #776

name: v1.3.17
body: - Add jitpack.yml to work around the Google licence issue (#778)

name: v1.3.16
body: - Fix onSelectionChange being emitted twice when calling fromHTML (#776)

name: v1.3.15
body: - Synced the caption span alignment attribute with its the align property

name: v1.3.14
body:
- Fixed issue where pasting over the whole text emitted a delete char, causing Gutenberg to remove whole block
- Updated Kotlin version to use stable version of Coroutines

name: v1.3.11
body:
### Fixed
- Fixed: Repeating characters in the editor

name: v1.3.10
body:
### Fixed
- Fixed: crash when deleting text (span handling)

name: v1.3.9
body:
### Added
- Added support for creating links that open in a new window.

### Fixed
- Fixed: don't perform initial hash calculation when pasting content

### Added
- Added the ability to use the new Android 8 feature "paste as plain text"

name: v1.3.7
body:
### Fixed
- Fixed initial hash calculation for change detection mechanism.
- Fixed crash with too many nested `<b>` tags.

### Changed
- Support for the `div`, `figure`, `figcaption` and `section` html elements to be block-level compatible instead of in-line.

name: v1.3.5
body:
### Fixed
- `<cite>` tags are now respected (were being converted to `<i>`).
- Fixed a bug where nested paragraphs would get duplicated
- Fixed Gutenberg audio and video blocks handling

### Fixed
- Better Gutenberg posts compatibility support (Gutenberg block delimiters are not lost anymore)
- Removed duplicate shortcut for Chromebook.

name: v1.3.3
body:
### Fixed
- Fix an issue that removed attributes from HR tags.
- Fix a focusing issue when copying text in an AztecText.

### Changed
- Hide the HTML button if the source editor is not set.

### Fixed
- Fix a crash with the "Paste As Plain Text" feature from Android O.

### Changed
- Accessibility: Add content description for heading and list menu items.
- Accessibility: Add support for touch exploration.

name: Version 1.3
body:
### Added
- RTL layout support for style toolbar and undo/redo action bar
- RTL text support for quote and list rendering
- Ability to apply block formatting across multiple nesting levels of elements

### Fixed
- Block element closing with a newline in nested elements
- List formatting when applied to the last line
- Applying block formatting over list items
- Line indicator rendering for items containing other block elements

### Changed
- Quote toggling, which removes the entire block now instead of a single line

name: Version 1.2
body:
### Added
- Text & image caption alignment support

### Fixed
- Crash when editing a heading
- Order of inserted images

name: Version 1.1
body:
### Added
- Plugin that detects and hides Gutenberg editor blocks in the visual editor
- Plugin that adds support for CSS-style underline formatting

### Fixed
- Bug on API 26+ when onMediaDeleted called even when no image was deleted
- Slow edit history performance
- Lost formatting on API 25 when inserting space before styled text
- Lost formatting on API 26+ when inserting a newline before styled text

name: Version 1.0.1
body:
### Fixed
- Crash when pasting certain text

name: Version 1.0
body:
### Fixed
- Various problems when editing captions
- Crash when copy/pasting certain text
- Crash when applying `<hr>`
- Cursor position after adding special comments or `<hr>`
- Image/video placeholder dimensions
- Problem when tapping an unknown element placeholder did not show the editor
- Text styling error when inserting a space before a formatted text

### Added
- VideoPress shortcode support
- Support for style attribute interpretation of CSS (text color)
- Ability to hide HTML comments in visual mode
- New media toolbar menu

### Changed
- Automatic caption deletion when it's empty
- Deleting an image now removes the caption

name: Version 1.0-beta.12
body:
### Fixed
- Text handling following immediately after images
- Undo/redo edit history
- Demo app sample text
- URL span not including href attribute when other attributes are present
- Broken UI tests
- Broken parsing of `<audio>` and `<video>` tags
- All content appearing in one line on older API levels
- Fixed image scaling
- RTL support for lists
- Text editing around images with captions
- Images not staying inside links

### Added
- Check for correct paragraph bounds to prevent crashes + logging if it's incorrect
- New link UI tests

name: Version 1.0-beta.11
body:
### Fixed
- Paragraphs with attributes being removed
- Conflicts of autocorrect/suggestions with editor styling
- Numbered list item display issues with multiple digits
- Abnormally tall lines following images without line breaks
- Incorrect click-handling around images not on separate lines

### Changed
- All images are made to be full-width & on separate lines

### Added
- Toolbar state notification interface for plugins
- Ability to place cursor next to an image
- Spellcheck suggestions
- Improved image-related performance

name: Version 1.0-beta.10
body:
### Fixed
- crash when HTML tags contained special regex characters ('$' or '\\')

name: Version 1.0-beta.9
body:
### Fixed
- OOB crash when unmarshalling URL span

name: Version 1.0-beta.8
body:
### Changed
- Gradle version to 4.1 and use the new `implementation` configuration to stop transient dependency leaking

### Added
- Configuration option to use the visual editor without the HTML editor

name: Version 1.0-beta.7
body:
### Changed
- Toolbar button highlighted state to use a color with more contrast

### Fixed
- Image/video loading placeholder drawable usage
- Quote styling of the paragraph ends, empty and mixed lines
- The missing hint bug if text is empty
- Crash in the URL dialog caused by the non plain text content of a clipboard
- Crash when copy/pasting lists
- Copy/pasting of non-latin unicode characters

### Added
- This changelog
- Plugin interface for regex plain text handler
- Plugin interface for HTML preprocessor
- Plugin interface for HTML postprocessor
- Plugin module with `[video]`, `[audio]` and `[caption]` WordPress shrotcode support
- OnMediaDeletedListener interface, detection and handling
- Copy/pasting of block element styles
- Copy/pasting of styled text and HTML from external sources

name: Version 1.0-beta.6
body:
### Changelog

- Plugin interface refactoring
- Fixed image tap detection
- Disabled the memory optimization of drawables (temporary fix for image disappearing bug)

name: Version 1.0-beta.5
body:
### Changelog

- Fixed a possible memory leak connected to drawables
- Fixed OOB crash in AztecMediaSpan
- Disabled styling of multiline text with lingering newlines (temporary crash fix)

name: Version 1.0-beta.4
body:
### Changelog

- 1st stage of plugin architecture redesign – moved special comments to a separate WordPress comments plugin
- Some UI tests got fixed
- Fixed a crash during quote parsing
- Fixed list styling, when 1st line was empty
- Fixed a bug when toolbar buttons only work when device keyboard is open
- Fixed a bug when style toolbar was erroneously highlighted

name: Version 1.0-beta.3
body:
### Changelog

- Fixed toolbar ellipsis button disabled state
- Added button click callbacks
- Updated toolbar layout to allow switching between simple/advanced mode
- Fixed toolbar collapse/expand triggers
- Fixed jittery cursor movement during media upload

> View build details and download artifacts on buddybuild:
> [AztecDemo (Android)](https://dashboard.buddybuild.com/apps/5800168c52aea90100a973ed/build/595a4a62700ae90001761b1f)

name: Version 1.0-beta.2
body:
### Changelog

- Major toolbar redesign & improvements (button reordering, updated icons & colors, new advanced mode, new list & heading menus and more)
- Fixed a bug that prevented an inline style to be removed in the middle of text
- Implemented <video> tag support & video playback
- Fixed a link selection crash
- Updated example content in the demo app
- Added UI tests for text formatting
- Fixed a bug that caused a wrong block element being selected in the toolbar

> See build details and artifacts at buddybuild:
> https://dashboard.buddybuild.com/apps/5800168c52aea90100a973ed/build/59484de404687c000103220c

name: Version 1.0-beta.1
body:
### Changelog

- `<pre>` tag with white-space formatting support
- Changing heading type for multiple headings bug fix
- Disappearing context menu during image upload fix
- Paragraphs disappearing while deleting fix
- Toolbar buttons selected state style change

> See build details and artifacts at buddybuild:
> https://dashboard.buddybuild.com/apps/5800168c52aea90100a973ed/build/59358beb4d93ff0001bc9e17

name: The first beta release
body:
### Changelog

- Fixed the heading menu bug
- Implemented paragraph support for double-newline separation in HTML
- Implemented paragraph (larger) break on return key
- Added support for embedded lists
- Fixed the crash when pressing undo while uploading an image
- Added ability to update element attributes from the library client

> See build details and artifacts at buddybuild:
> https://dashboard.buddybuild.com/apps/5800168c52aea90100a973ed/build/58fe604408d9030001408fa3

name: Version 0.5.0-alpha.5
body:
### Changelog

- Added support for the `<hr>` tag
- Fixed a bug that resulted in quote style removal
- Fixed another quote style rendering issue
- Fixed the crash when adding an image to an empty post
- Fixed the freezing & lagging when having multiple images in a post
- Fixed the weird cursor behavior around special comments

> See build details and artifacts at buddybuild:
> https://dashboard.buddybuild.com/apps/5800168c52aea90100a973ed/build/58ecc225dfe3a700018384fe

name: Version 0.5.0-alpha.4
body:
### Changelog

- Fixed Toolbar crash report
- Having multiple bullets with nested lists
- Nested lists getting removed when switching to HTML mode
- The nesting of lists/quotes getting swapped when toggling HTML mode
- Disappearing newlines between headings
- Closing lists with double enter adding extra newline
- Text inside paragraph getting moved outside when toggling HTML mode
- Heading inside list & quote adding extra newlines
- Double space to end sentence inserting a space before period
- Using backspace on Nougat causing weird cursor behavior
- Weird cursor behavior when deleting text inside quote
- Heading inside lists adding extra newlines
- Dropped the Merriweather font and use the default serif & monospace fonts
- Updated the Heading icon
- Updated unknown-HTML dialog style to match the WordPress colors
- Fixed the heading-deletion crash
- Fixed a strange behavior when adding multiple different heading

> See build details and artifacts at buddybuild:
> https://dashboard.buddybuild.com/apps/5800168c52aea90100a973ed/build/58d8c4bde28b8400016b913c

name: Version 0.5.0-alpha.3
body:
- fixed cursor visibility on highlighted background
- fixed broken links on older Android versions
- fixed empty block quotes being removed
- wide images inside lists are now adjusted to fit
- toolbar state is preserved on rotation
- added keyboard shortcuts for format toolbar buttons
- new unknown HTML (question mark icon) edit dialog
- fixed the link crash
- span tag is now formatted inline

> See build details and artifacts at buddybuild:
> https://dashboard.buddybuild.com/apps/5800168c52aea90100a973ed/build/58b3fd6f0114940100bd7b34

name: Version 0.5.0-alpha.2
body:
A handful of bug fixes.

> See build details and artifacts at buddybuild:
> https://dashboard.buddybuild.com/apps/5800168c52aea90100a973ed/build/58a1d54a21412a010015f750

name: The first alpha release
body:
### This release supports the following
- Synchronized visual and HTML mode
- Edit history with undo/redo
- Images (both downloading & adding)
- Headings
- Text styling (bold, italic, underline, strike-through)
- Quotes
- Lists (numbered & bullets)
- Links
- HTML comments
- More & page special tags
- Hidden tags (`div`, `span`)
- Unknown HTML (replaced with a question mark in visual mode)
- Emojis

### Planned features
- Videos
- Embedded lists
- Block editing of unknown HTML

> See build details and artifacts at buddybuild:
> https://dashboard.buddybuild.com/apps/5800168c52aea90100a973ed/build/589ae5fa8b021501007f2e61
